text: Reuf Herco (born 16 July 1964 in Breza, SFR Yugoslavia ) is a retired Bosnian- Herzegovinian professional footballer. Herco played the position of Forward for Rudar Breza, FK Sarajevo and NK Unis in Vogosca. After retiring from professional football he established a private football academy in his hometown. Furthermore, he is a board member of Rudar Breza. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:FK Sarajevo players Category:Association football forwards Category:Living people
title: Reuf Herco
